title: I am setting up a Google Home network and my Pixel 2 cannot see the 2.4 Gz wifi. Apparently this is the only speed tha Google Home device will accept. I have looked for ways to change settings etc but the only network I see is the 5.0 Ghz. Anyone have a clue if this is even possible with my phone? Seems like Google set it up to only accept the fastest wifi and that is pretty dumb.
content: Unable to connect to a slower (2.4 Ghz) network - no way to select it
